conversation.content: So, um, I'm sorry to bother you but like... I was supposed to get a callback yesterday?
Oh! Um, let me just... what's the... okay so I'm pulling up your account here. Can I get your... actually wait, do you have your case number? It should be like... CSE-something?
I think it's it's... CSE-4821-B? Sorry, I'm just... really bad with numbers.
Perfect! CSE-4821-B. Right. So, um... okay between you and me? This is... hmm, this is actually kind of embarrassing. Your callback was scheduled for 2 PM yesterday. And it looks like... well...
Yeah, so basically I waited all afternoon and, um, nothing.

I know, I know. Look, I'm gonna... what's the word... level with you here. Agent ID AGT-9923 was supposed to call. But there was this whole... thing. System crash. Total mess. Nobody's callbacks went through.
Oh. Oh god, I'm sorry, I thought I thought maybe I gave the wrong number or something.

No no no! Um, definitely not your fault. Like, at all. So here's what I'm gonna do... and don't, uh, don't mention this to anyone else calling in... but I can get you a priority callback. Within the hour. Guaranteed.
That's... I mean, um, that's really nice but like, I don't want to cause trouble.
Trouble? Nah. Between us? Um, I've got this little... workaround. Ticket TKT-88542-QV is getting, uh, let's say... creatively reclassified. VIP status. You didn't hear it from me though, yeah?
I just... I can't... sorry, it's been such a long week and everything's just...
Hey. Hey, I get it. Look, um, what was your original issue about? Like the... the thing you needed help with?
So so basically my account got, um, double-charged? Three times actually.
Three times?! Okay so... hmm... let me just... Reference RFD-6677-AA, RFD-6678-AB, and... yep, RFD-6679-AC. All on the same day. That's... wow. No wonder you're...
Yeah. And I'm just... sorry, I'm being so emotional about this, it's it's stupid.
Um, no? Not stupid. At all. So like... here's the deal. I'm expediting all three refunds. Right now. Processing ID PRC-445821-X. Should hit your account in... 24 hours. Max.
Really? I mean, um, they said they said it would take like five to seven business days last time.
Yeah well... that's the, uh, official line. But since we completely dropped the ball on your callback... I'm using override code OVR-1127. Don't, um, don't tell my supervisor I have that code, okay?
I don't know what to say, I'm just so so relieved, um, thank you.

Hey, um, pleasure's all mine. Confirmation number CNF-9884521-K for everything. And listen... if you need anything else? Ask for me directly. Agent Maria. ID MRA-4455. I'll, uh... I'll make sure you're taken care of.
